title: My microphone doesn't work except on speakerphone or when I use headphones.
content:
My microphone only works on speaker mode or when I use headphones. However when I record videos the sound is ok. But I can't give any voice commands and I can't record voice messages on any app. 
Any ideas how to fix this?
Already did factory reset. Did not help. 
Pixel 3a
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 3a
